abstract.t: This document describes best practices for Working Groups that use GitHub for their work. Note to Readers Discussion of this document takes place on the GitHub@ietf mailing list (ietf-and-github@ietf.org), which is archived at https://mailarchive.ietf.org/arch/search?email_list=ietf-and-github [1]. Source for this draft and an issue tracker can be found at https://github.com/ietf-gitwg/using-github [2].
